tool_description: Maintains comprehensive vendor records, handles updates, enables search and retrieval, and manages vendor profile data across the procurement system.

action.description: Database operation: create, update, retrieve, search, delete

registration_id.description: Vendor registration identifier for specific operations

update_fields.description: Fields to update in vendor record

include_inactive.description: Include inactive vendors in search results

error_messages: Invalid action: Use one of [create, update, retrieve, search, delete].
Registration not found: The provided registration_id does not exist for update/retrieve operations.
Missing search criteria: Search operations require at least one search criterion.
Update failed: Unable to update vendor record due to data constraints.
Access denied: Insufficient permissions to perform the requested database operation.
usage: Specify action type and relevant parameters. For updates, provide registration_id and update_fields. For searches, use search_criteria. For retrievals, provide registration_id.

operation_status.description: Result of the database operation (success, failed, partial)

records_found.description: Number of vendor records matching the operation

vendor_summaries.description: Brief summaries of matching vendor records
